title: How can we download Urdu books in PDF? - Quora

response.answer_text: Its not a big deal if you are a regular reader. Now in this digital era knowledge is no more difficult to access. Google have a bunch of sites where they are providing you required knowledge. As far as urdu books are concerned, i read english books as well as urdu books in pdf. You just have to repeat the procedure as you do to download an english version book. Just go to google and enter some keywords like e.g book name, download, pdf etc. Surely you will get the right site where you can download pdf urdu book easily.
